author: denizsun
body:
#### PR description:

  - We have added useful figures to DQM for data certification 
  -  Detailed information can be found: [gitlab issue](https://gitlab.cern.ch/cmshcal/docs/-/issues/258)
  - Plots are shown in: [slides](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1532808/contributions/6500798/attachments/3060049/5410904/HCAL_DQM_CMSWeek_08042025_.pdf)

#### PR validation:

- runTheMatrix test is done

#### Backport : 
- This is not a backport PR.
title: Useful figures added in HCAL DQM for Data Certification
